content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) and Furnace at position (-12.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) connected to both furnaces
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) for storing iron plates
- Transport Belts connecting the furnaces and the chest

### Electricity Generation Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (-4.5, 25.5) for power distribution

### Iron Ore and Coal Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions for transporting iron ore and coal
- Multiple Burner Inserters positioned along the transport belts for loading and unloading resources

### Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -44.5) storing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (-11.5, -44.5) for additional storage

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. For example, attempting to insert coal into a furnace without having coal in the inventory will result in an error.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
